name: Launching Balls (Alpha V0.0.5.9)
description:
This game is a work in progress. Only 10 levels have been made. It is also recommended that you play in full screen mode.

Drag the blue ball with left click then let go to throw the ball. Press R to reset

If you play the game and enjoyed it, I would love to hear some feedback.

If you find any bugs, please comment them down below

WHATEVER YOU DO, DO NOT PRESS R IN THE MAIN MENU!!!
